  --- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@E...> 
  wrote:
  > It's a fuchi that's made from another fitting, in this case a kogai. 
  It's the same as the usage of naoshi in kogai naoshi kozuka: a kozuka 
  that is made out of a kogai.  

  Wow, I'll have to examine the pics more closely. I don't see
  how that would be done given the thickness of a kogai and needing
  to bend it into an oval to make a fuchi. Neat..

  Thanks
  Rich S
